Changelog
=========

0.5.1 (2012-11-06)
-------------------

- Added copyright field


0.5 (2012-11-05)
-------------------

- Added option to show bodytext

0.3 (2012-10-30)
-------------------

- Added option to show title and description


0.2 (2012-10-30)
-------------------

- Added extra style sheet


0.1 (2012-10-30)
-------------------

- Initial release
